response.overview: Released in 2006, Neverend is a hybrid fantasy RPG/adventure game for the PC about a fallen fairy named Agavaen and her quest to recover her magical Macguffin amulet, and something about self-identity. The game was panned by critics when it came out, and it boasts a whopping score of 44 on Metacritic. Individual players tend to be more forgiving, and give it a solid "Meh" out of ten.
response.title: Let's Play Neverend
